main event: A civilian observed a bright bluish-green ball of light making a zigzag course in the sky in Casey County, Kentucky on March 20, 1958.
interesting points: The object expanded in size during the observation., It moved at high speeds and then hovered for a few seconds before disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The object had a definite course heading towards Ohio., The object could potentially be viewed by several witnesses; however, it could not be positively identified.
sighted object: a bright bluish-green ball of light
